name: Happy/Sad
description:
Sometimes we lose our happyness, but if we try very hard, we´ll found it again. 

One of the hardest plataform game ever.

If you pass this game, let in the comments the number of deaths.

Stay strong and keep your happiness whatever it takes.

Thanks for playing.

Pirty J.

Music by my friend Juan Pablo De Amo.

Recommended version: 1.32

Version 1.21 had a problem, that made the game almost impossible. Please download the latest version uploaded if you have an oldest. My deepest apologies.

Version 1.25 resolve every problem, but it so hard, that make the game almost impossible (a bit easier than 1.21). I let this version for the players that want challenge. 

Download the "perfect" version 1.32.
